name: Mansion In The Woods [TEST]
description:
!!ATTENTION!!

This is not a finished product, this is a test game that I made.  I tried uploading this game several times because I had no idea how to upload Renpy games. (Please note, I'm not sure if the web version works.) And I've only grazed the intro, so please send me any concerns or questions about this game to this twitter account. I'll post updates and art when I feel like it.

The mansion in the woods is where all the bad kids go.

You and your best friend get lost in the woods and find a mansion. The owner of it was kind enough to let you two in until dawn, at least that's what you thought at first. 

You two are now trapped with the owner of the mansion along with three other people. You have seven days to escape before the mansion transforms you into a monster, like the others.

Legend says that only pure emotion could help someone escape.
